answers.answer: Congratulations to you and your new little one
Congratulations mama!! I hope both you and baby are in pink!!!

Congrats! I'm scheduled for a c-section on the 19th a week from tomorrow. My due date is March 4, but gestational diabetes and high blood pressure and wanting to have my tubes tied,  Doc said c-sect was probably best because inducing can take up to 3 days and 50% of the time it ends in c-sect anyway. I'm just worried about the ppd and recovery. Let me know how you're feeling with recovery if u get a chance.  I know you'll be bust with baby.

Thank you everyone.. Hi dear, it is my first baby and c section postpartum is really hard for me so far. I am on pain killers but if I miss any dose, it hurts like hell. But so far its good except from stiffness n pain. Got my stitches removed yesterday. Good luck for your delivery. Stay relaxed.

question: My little one is here.. Water broke at home @ 7 am in 10/2/15. Came to hospital. Did not feel contractions till they hook me on oxydocyn. I lost all my water so on contractions baby heartbeat was going down. I was only 5 cm till 7. Ended up having c section at 8:45pm. Omg my baby is so cute... Good luck to all you ladies and thank u for all ur support
title: he is here
